text:
そもそも、海軍の軍服ってどうなっていたのだろうか。
思い返せば、私も含めた自然系能力者は覚醒してないにも関わらず、服ごとすり抜けや再生したりと便利なものであった。 今世でも同じ感覚で力を使えば、体こそ元に戻るものの、服は戻らずじまいである。 むしろ能力を使うほど、服が凍って動かしづらいのだ。
trans:
To begin with, what exactly were navy uniforms like?
Thinking back, even though I, along with other Logia users, had not awakened our powers, it was quite convenient that we could phase through or regenerate with our clothes intact. However, in this life, while using my powers feel the same, my body returns to normal, but my clothes remain unchanged. In fact, the more I use my abilities, the more my clothes freeze, making them harder to move in.
